Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for but little things could make it better”
Reviews.Author: cwa1
Reviews.Content: It's cheap and in a good location for china town, little Italy and Canal St but it could be better. There is no lift but no offer to carry bags - didn't bother us but if you struggle with heavy objects it wouldn't suit you. Also the rooms are very small but have everything you need. I would recommend a shelf up in the bathroom for guest's toiletries and make sure towels and throws don't have holes in ( likes ours did ).

Reviews.Title: “The worst hostel ever!!”
Reviews.Author: aaaa113
Reviews.Content: The only good point was the location, but it smelled so bad around there. You can hear people snoring next room. There was no window. We had to share the bathroom and it was not clean. They didn't have the elevator, so it was really hard to bring the big baggage to upstairs. When we asked the staff to bring up the baggage, they told us to pay for that. The room was really small. We even couldn't open the baggage on the floor, so we had to opened it on the bed. The bed was not confortable at all. The bed cover was too small for the bed. I strongly recommend not to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “great value!”
Reviews.Author: Mary L
Reviews.Content: As the previous reviewer wrote, yes, the bed is hard, no window, tiny room, however - if you plan to pretty much only sleep in your room, this is an excellent choice. Excellent Chinatown/Little Italy location. Close to great shopping on Canal/Broadway. Easy subway access to all other points! Friendly staff. Secure main entrance. Free WiFi! Read over other reviews with interest both before and after - old buildings should not be confused with dirty. This was quite clean.

Reviews.Title: “not that bad”
Reviews.Author: faye444
Reviews.Content: After spending a few nights at the Bowery Whitehouse Hotel, the World Hotel seemed like a 5 star hotel!!! The room was small yes and the bed was hard and the room had no windows but we did find the staff to be extremely friendly, the location was great- in the middle of little china and very close to little italy and also close to subways. The room had an airconditioner which worked great, room had a tv. the bathrooms were clean and there were 3 on each floor so you didnt have to wait. As you are only sleeping here at night i think for what you pay for is not too bad.

Reviews.Title: “Worst ever. PLEASE-- PLEASE read the reviews and don’t try this hotel that was my mistake”
Reviews.Author: lilcoco1
Reviews.Content: I had booked this on Hotel.com for 5 days. When I got there, there was NO WATER.. the front desk was awful, I called hotels.com and was on hold for 4 hours .. no kidding.. I got sick not just because of the smell and no water but it was blood on the pillows and sheets. And staff just said "here is a new pillow" and even that was dirty with blood. I had to go the ER. I called hotel.com so I can check out and get some money back. They kept hanging up on me finally after 10 hours of calling them.. i got thru someone nice.. how can a hotel not have water on?? This place is worst then a nightmare. PLEASE, save money and stay somewhere livable or go at the park and sleep. and BUGS all over the room..

Reviews.Title: “This was the worst hotel. No elevator!”
Reviews.Author: barthol
Reviews.Content: This was the worst hotel. No lift, we had to also carry luggage to 3 floor! , The bed was hard to sleep, unpleasant staff. Luckily we were there for only 20 hours, no more this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Avoid staying here!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kunaths
Reviews.Content: What I have encountered here that the room is not well ventilated. I asked the front desk to make the room colder or at least add the fan speed and told me that he can't (with an attitude) because the a/c is centralized. So i asked if he has an available fan for me to borrow but again with an attittude that he say that he dont have. Well it seems that i'm gonna be stuck here for 2 nights without any ventillation!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value, good location, but bring earplugs... the walls are paper thin!”
Reviews.Author: fire7623
Reviews.Content: Good value, good location, but bring earplugs... the walls are paper thin! The front desk is friendly and helpful; the place was in a good location in the middle of China Town and within walking distance of subways and tasty restaurants, not to mention SoHo and Little Italy, But while we stayed, people were loud at night and not at all courteous to other guests. We only used our hotel for sleeping and showering, as we were out most of the day and into the night. Basically, you get what you pay for. It was a decent place, not a five star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A very Bad hotel”
Reviews.Author: larry_downy
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for 1 night. (I was on a Business Trip in NY) I did not check any reviews before booking as I didn't have time for it. The hotel is really horrifying. The rooms are so small!!! The furniture is old. The smell is bad. I supposed to stay longer in this hotel, but I could not sleep there so I booked another hotel.

Reviews.Title: “NOT a bargain!!!”
Reviews.Author: JohnQConsummer
Reviews.Content: I am not pretentious. I was born in a poor country and can put up with inconvenience. I thought I was getting a bargain with NYC prices being what they are. Wrong!! This was ten times worse than the worst I had ever experienced in communist times Romania. Service zero. Room smelled really bad. Very dirty. One bathroom/shower per floor, Dirty! Room size exactly 4 by 8 feet. No window, no ventilation, almost 100 degrees while 55 outside. Did I mention dirty and stinky? I considered sleeping in the park... A homeless shelter is better. Really!

Reviews.Title: “Please take the warning.”
Reviews.Author: KeyWestGal44
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one night after going to see a show in the city. My partner did not check any reviews before booking and thought the hotel would be cheap but decent. It was horrifying. It's not that the rooms are small, it goes so beyond that. They are old and filthy and not really hotels rooms at all but little box rooms with no windows and box springs as beds. The whole place smelled so gross and the thin walls forced you to hear everything going on in the neighboring rooms and hallway, which was really disgusting at two in the morning!!! Take this review seriously because when we saw the room, we both wanted to cry. We walked down to the Best Western, two blocks away and begged for a room but they were all booked. STAY SOMEWHERE ELSE!

Reviews.Title: “Only stay here if you absolutely have to”
Reviews.Author: gc10_10
Reviews.Content: I booked a budget hotel in New York and was prepared for basic and am happy with simple but the thing that got me with this hotel was the open ceiling - a grill covered by a door mat had been placed in an attempt to minimise the impact to the unsuspecting traveller that you are sharing your room with a family who live directly above. Apart from the noise (from the family above and from the neighbours due to the paper thin walls), the lack of windows and the noisy air conditioning did not make for a decent nights sleep. I booked 2 nights but decided to abandon the second night - surely a sign of how bad this place is. I also would not describe my room or the bathrooms as particularly clean - though the bedding did smell of bleach which I actually found very reassuring!

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel experience in my life!!”
Reviews.Author: Steu4president
Reviews.Content: Don't go there! The room are small, very dirty e noisy. The bed was dirty and as comfortable as to sleep on a piece of wood. The bathroom and some towel were dirty too. It's a cheap hotel but to sleep in these condition it's very expensive! My experience there was in the middle from a joke and a nightmare!

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare in China Town!”
Reviews.Author: Andriu01
Reviews.Content: I went there as me and my friends decided to go cheap - great mistake! When I first entered the room I was thinking that it was some sort of funny joke, then I realized that it was truth. Called me spoiled because I am european but here we actualy have windows in every room. Never in my entire life had I imagined that there can be a hotel room with no windows!!!! One can hear people from the other rooms, the walls are like a public rest room - they do not go all the way up to the ceiling. Of course to be correct I have to mention that the man behind the "reception desk" was polite, the location is kind of communicative and if you can ignore the smell of bleach may be the place is ok. To summarize unless you are really tight on the budger go to a normal hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Don't go there ! It is awfull !”
Reviews.Author: matou7
Reviews.Content: Don't go there ! Small hole in wall near window : cold in winter. WC did Blocked every time you use more than 1 paper sheet (not a joke)!!! Shower had no curtains : water was pouring everywhere in the bathroom. Not very clean, especially the blanket. Towels were dirty. The air-ventilation is as noisy as in an airplane : difficult to sleep. No lift, very high stairs to climb with luggage.

Reviews.Title: “EWW”
Reviews.Author: sunflowe8
Reviews.Content: This place was awfull. I've stayed in hostels before but this was way worse than imagined. The bed was freakishly hard, it was cold, and diry. The walls are so thin you can hear everything your neighbours do. There were kids screaming down the halls at 2:00am and Chiness television playing all day so you could never sleep. Trust me, stay away there are much better for just as cheap.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: If your thinking of staying at the World Hotel I strongly advise you not to. Its small, dirty, and smelly. Our window sill was full of garbage(gum, food, smoked cigars) and there were cockroaches crawling all over the walls. The bathroom was not a complete wall (it ended 1 ft from the ceiling) and we could hear people using the bathroom next to us. The only good thing about our experience was the $.65 beer at the store next door! I will never set foot in this dump again!

Reviews.Title: “scary”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I had read a very negative review posted here but decided to try this place out for myself. Well, it's worse than I've ever imagined. Besides the fact that the rooms have no privacy (you can hear all of your neighbors)... there were roaches, it was dirty, the bathroom was scary--literally. I always stay in budget hotels in NYC and I've had my share of not-so-good ones but this one is absolutely the nastiest hotel I've ever seen. It's a dump.

HotelInfo.Name: World Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 101 Bowery, New York City, NY 10002
